meta.title: Home - Avon Local School District

div.class: tm-headerbar tm-headerbar-default uk-container uk-container-center uk-flex uk-flex-space-between

div.h3: The following communication was sent to all families on 4/18/2020
div.p: This week, Governor Mike DeWine will roll out his plan to reopen Ohio. We will continue to engage our students in educational activities at home until we receive more guidance from the Governor. We want to remind everyone that this virtual engagement will begin once again on Monday, April 20, 2020.
Individual school buildings will be sending a communication with details for their students and families.

As we get back to business, we invite you to enjoy our very own Avon Electric Orchestra as they perform their Virtual rendition of Gun's N' Roses, Sweet Child O' Mine. We hope you take the opportunity enjoy this performance.
Thank you to everyone for their continued support and partnership.

With Eagle Pride,
Avon Local Schools

div.h3: Unfortunately our annual art show is not able to take place this year. However, our art teachers have put together a virtual showcase of their students' work. Click the videos below to see their amazing work!
